Bases: PermissionDenied

class apps.entity.authentication.ExplicitCSRFSessionAuthentication[source]¶

Bases: SessionAuthentication

Wrapper class that raises an explicit CSRFPermissionDenied on CSRF failure to facilitate custom behavior in entity.views.exception_handler.

enforce_csrf(request)[source]¶

Enforce CSRF validation for session based authentication.
